QuestData.Title: Old Hatreds
QuestData.Description:
<Baine is still breathing heavily from his recent battles.>
I will not leave... until Jamoku pays... for what he has done...
I will avenge Bovan... no matter the cost...
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Jamoku was responsible for the attacks on the tauren and the death of Bovan Windtotem, among others.
